document_data.name: ''Gullswing''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Gullswing''''' was the personal [[caravel]] of [[Dalvar Corzon]], a [[Cormyrean Freesails]] privateer in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The ship had a crew of 18 sailors, was armed with a medium [[ballista]], and used trained [[seagull]]s to carry messages.
